title: Online Collaborative Leadership Competency Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning-Based Social Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary education management experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing the ability to design and operate collaborative learning activities executable in smartphone environments for elementary education administrators/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three strategies to promote social interaction when designing online collaborative learning
Learners can design at least one collaborative activity scenario feasible in mobile environments
Learners can enhance their collaborative learning operational competence by 20% or more through peer assessment and feedback processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
